ygData.subject: Level CAP for tinkering.
ygData.msgSnippet: From my reading many posts (ever since before Gnomad)brought up his great page.  I have seen and read and watch everything. My conclusions on Level CAP for
ygData.messageBody:
From my reading many posts (ever since before Gnomad)brought up his great
page. I have seen and read and watch everything.

My conclusions on Level CAP for tinkering skill is as follow:

It has the same exact scheme and Spell Caster Research...

it start at 16 (the same)..you can only get 1 level of skill up at 16th.

On research, I could not TRAIN anymore point until I hit 20th.

Seem to the same with all the tinkering story.

Once you hit 20th, you could train 5 points...and every level 5 more
points...(or was it every 4 levels)..

Anyway, from what I read, what happened seem to conform with my theory.

What is you guys feedback?

Thanks for all the info. (all in the list..yes even joshua.)
-Untos of Bertoxx Server
Follower of Brell Siris.
